== Introduction ==
This specification is about a 'Beginners survival Kit' for Ubuntu

== Rationale ==
This is a Sort of a proposal for ubuntu beginners kit(with 2 DVDs..) one DVD hardy(each of the three variants) and manuals on how to install and boot/multi boot ubuntu and links to documentation,community and loco sites and so on) and another containing Ubuntu Mobile Edition OS and documentation on how to install and a comparison of UME with other mobile OS' and Ubuntu Source code(in the sense to make ubuntu more free) and some Open source applications that run on windows and there by cutting down the no of CDs ubuntu is shipping through shipit..
